Attendee Meetup Tonight!

Becky Hamm is heading up an attendee meetup tonight at 6:30 p.m. The Ale and the Witch is where things will get started. We'll try to come out to say hi later in the night once we're caught up.

The 600 Block

If you're into street art or art in general, you'll want to check out the 600 block, which is 6th St. If you wander the streets and alleys of Central and a few avenues north and south, there is lots of great work to see.

Best Food Options

Depending on what you are looking for, St. Pete has some great food. Here the best choices (in our opinion).
Pizza - Woodfired Pizza
Late Night Pizza - Fortunato's Pizza
Burgers - The Avenue
Mexican - Red Mesa Cantina
Cheap beer and yummy food that is horrible for you - Five Bucks
Overall Fav - Moon Under Water
I'll tweet out any that people reply with that I missed.

The Dali

If there is one thing to see in the area, it is the Dali Musuem. The work is fantastic and it is complimented by wonderful grounds and architecture.

Bars

There are so many great bars. Depending on what style you're after, we suggest roaming Central Ave between Beach Drive and 4th St.

Alternative Meetups

If anyone is interested in heading up a trek to the baseball game Friday night, please let me know.
See you soon!
Dan
